title: Inquiry About New Government Fee
description: A customer is calling to ask about a new 'Regulatory Recovery Fee' that appeared on their bill.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and locate the new fee on their billing statement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the specified fee on the customer's bill.

tasks.description: Access the internal knowledge base to find the official explanation for the new fee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the approved script explaining the government-mandated fee.

tasks.description: Clearly explain the purpose of the fee to the customer using the information from the knowledge base.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately and clearly communicates the reason for the new charge.
